price: ហើយ(ចូរចងចាំ)នៅពេលដែលម្ចាស់របស់អ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់)បានហៅមូសាថាៈ ចូរអ្នកធ្វើដំណើរទៅកាន់ក្រុមដែលបំពាន ចុះ។
arabic: وَإِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئۡتِ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh nādā rabbuka mūsā ani i'ti al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
